meanings.definition: A snack typically served with beer, consisting of peanuts coated in a savory seasoning.
meanings.sent1: I love munching on a beernut while watching the game.
meanings.sent2: At the bar, they always offer beernuts to go with your drink.
meanings.sent3: The beernut rolled off the table and into the lap of the person next to me.
meanings.sent4: The beernut was a flavorful explosion in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the beernut filled the room, making everyone crave a taste.

meanings.definition: A person who is a fan of beer and enjoys consuming it regularly.
meanings.sent1: My uncle is a true beernut, always trying new craft brews.
meanings.sent2: The beernut recommended the best local breweries to visit.
meanings.sent3: The beernut joked that beer is their daily bread and butter.
meanings.sent4: She was a beernut in a world of wine enthusiasts.
meanings.sent5: The beernut's collection of beer bottles was impressive and extensive.
